Text.Page:
Say, one of our soldiers went missing while we were on patrol near the temple guesthouse. It was a terrible shock to everyone, of courseâ€”we turned around and he was gone.

It would mean a lot to me if you'd look for Tilian. Will you?

So he's dead. I was certain he must be, but still....

Will you tell his brother, Burtrand?
Please find Tilian. Not knowing what happened to him is hard on all of us.

Tilian is dead? I suppose I was still holding on to some hope that he'd be back. I can only hope it was quick.

I'll be all right. Really. And every one of those bastards I kill will be for him.
